response.original_title: Circles on Circles: A Cinematic Journey With Caspian
response.overview: Drawing from footage captured at Studio 4 in Conshohocken, PA while recording “On Circles” throughout May 2019, and an ensuing European tour in August of the same year, “Circles on Circles: a Cinematic Journey with Caspian” is more than just our attempt to depict a traditional documentary film. It is, instead, a deeply personal insight into who we are as individuals and how these insights inform our creative process and our place within Caspian; our continually evolving, central form of both self and collective expression.
response.title: Circles on Circles: A Cinematic Journey With Caspian
